==Links of Interest== *[https://www.intel.com/content/www/us/en/wireless-products/dual-band-wireless-ac-9462-brief.html Product Brief] *[https://www.sevenforums.com/network-sharing/415513-intel-wifi-ac-9260-driver-fir-win7-x32-x64.html On '''Seven''' forums] ([https://git.kernel.org/pub/scm/linux/kernel/git/iwlwifi/iwlwifi-fixes.git/tree/drivers/net/wireless/intel/iwlwifi/pcie/drv.c iwlwifi git]) :PCI\VEN_8086&DEV_A370&SUBSYS_42A48086
*[https://www.intel.com/content/www/us/en/support/articles/000026155/network-and-i-o/wireless-networking.html Integrated Intel Wireless-AC (CNVi) and Companion RF (CRF) Module] *[https://epictech.ru/intel-300-series-chipset/ Intel 300 series chipset: '''B360/H310/H370/Q370'''] • [https://www.pcworld.com/article/3268063/components-processors/intel-motherboard-z370-vs-h370-vs-b360-vs-h310-8th-gen-cpu.html On '''PC|World''']
==Notes== ===Compatibles models=== :Intel B360, H310, H370, Q370 Chipsets Intel 300 series (CNVio) - Mobile SiP (U- & Y-) PCH-H/LP : :8th Gen Intel Core processors *''Amber Lake'' (Core i7 8500Y, Core i5 8210Y/8200Y) :- Apple MacBook Air 13 (2018) *''Coffee Lake'' (Core i7 8559U, Core i5 8269U/8259U) :- Apple MacBook Pro (2018)/Intel NUC (2018) *''Whiskey Lake'' (Core i7 8565U, Core i5 8265U) :- Notebooks (2018 - 2019) *''Gemini Lake'' ([[Intel Atom]]) - CNVio : :*[[Intel Celeron]]: J4105/J4005/N4100/N4000 :*[[Intel Pentium]] (Silver): J5005/N5000 <!-- Intel 9560 (CNVio2): *''Cannon Lake'' (Core i3 8121U) - ?? *''Kaby Lake'' R (Core i5 8250U, Core i7 8550U) - ?? *''Kaby Lake'' G - ?? -->
